reference.shortdesc: The choices element contains a list of choices. Each choice represents a way that a user can complete the current step.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The choices element is specialized from ul. It is defined in the task module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how a user can be presented with different ways to select a server:
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>Choose a server:</cmd> <choices> <choice>If you have a remote server you want to test on, type the IP address or hostname of the server.</choice> <choice>If you want to do local testing, type localhost.</choice> </choices> </step>
